summary: Professional website for Lasereraa - industrial laser cutting services (metal, MDF, acrylic) and customizable gift items
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Industrial laser cutting metal in action, sharp focused beam cutting through steel plate with sparks (laser-cutting-hero.dim_1200x600.png)
- Precision laser engraving on acrylic material showing detailed pattern work (acrylic-precision.dim_800x600.png)
- Collection of elegant corporate gift items including engraved metal plaques and custom wooden boxes (corporate-gifts.dim_800x600.png)
- Modern industrial facility interior with laser cutting machines and metallic aesthetic (facility-background.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Lasereraa company logo in sharp metallic style with industrial design elements (lasereraa-logo.dim_400x400.png)

existing_features.title: Create a professional homepage with hero section showcasing Lasereraa as an industrial laser cutting organization, featuring the domain name lasereraa.com prominently
Create a services section displaying laser cutting capabilities for metal, MDF, and acrylic materials with clear descriptions
Create a products section showcasing corporate gift items and customizable gift offerings with visual presentation

Implement a sharp, industrial design theme with precision-focused visual elements that reflect industrial manufacturing and laser cutting aesthetics, using metallic tones, clean lines, and technical typography throughout the website
Create a contact section with company information and call-to-action for inquiries about laser cutting services and gift items

new_feature_requests.summary: Create professional website showcasing industrial laser cutting services and gift items
Display services: laser cutting (metal, MDF, acrylic)
Showcase corporate gift items and customizable gift offerings
Include domain name lasereraa.com in website
